short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects tracking scripts such as Tag Manager, GA4, and FB pixel. Shows images, colors, fonts, and links for SEO and web design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Helper, the all-in-one web analysis helper

Key Features:

☆ Detailed Script Analysis: Uncover the scripts embedded within web pages, including Google Analytics 4 (GA4), Google Analytics 3 (GA3), Facebook Pixel, Tag Manager, and other external and internal scripts.

☆ Image Extraction: Effortlessly extract images from web pages, gaining access to their URLs, dimensions, and image formats. You can download a single image or multiple images at once, and preview images directly within the extension.

☆ HTML Color Palette: Discover the color palettes used in web designs, extracting the exact hexadecimal codes for each color. Utilize the integrated color picker to select specific colors from the website or your operating system.

☆ Font Identification: Identify all fonts employed in web designs, obtaining their names, classification, and font styles.

☆ Link Analysis: Uncover all external and internal links on a page and identify their source elements. Filter, sort, and copy link data for in-depth analysis and optimization.


With Web Helper, you can:

☆ Understand the analytics tools and tag management systems used by competitors.

☆ Gather inspiration for your own web design and branding.

☆ Effortlessly review article backlinks and internal link building

☆ Simplify your design workflow by easily accessing key elements.

Web Helper is the essential tool for marketers, web developers, SEO professionals, designers, and anyone who wants to gain a deeper understanding of the websites they encounter.
